attributes.review:
I downloaded the app looking for some understanding as to why so many blind sheep follow a blind shepard only to prove
myself right — there’s no understanding. the app is deeply flawed in its technology, its so slow..just like trump! so much hate and false misleading information! it really made me realize... if trump doesn’t care enough to make a good app for himself then he doesn’t care about us! He has no regard for the human race, deflecting his ludicrous irresponsibility in China! Wow! What a moron. Terrible app, terrible president.
attributes.title: Terrible! Just like him!

attributes.review: The app is so poorly designed, I sometimes question whether it is even made by actual human beings. Not only is the app bombarded by this strange old man, it seems to claim that he is my president. That little clown is not my president I don’t know who that dude is. The app also leaves most people I’ve discussed with uncomfortable. The app also serves no purpose, because there are other things that do the same thing as this app. Therefore the app is redundant and shouldn’t exist.  Yeah❤️
attributes.title: This app has problems

attributes.review: do NOT download this app. this is ur warning. A WARNING. when i downloaded this app, I immediately started to turn orange. it's like there was visceral cheeto dust peeling off my skin! for days after, the only thing that came out of my mouth was "trump 2020!" and "snowflake!" it's like i was completely braindead!!!! also the evil trumpies hacked into my phone and changed my background to a picture of the cheeto's ~ p a r t s ~.  anyone know how to change it back? it's not schmexy :/ I CANT UNSEE IT MY EYES ARE BLEEDING VERY UGLY NO KITH FOR HIM DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: hell is better than this app

attributes.review: Wants you to put in a lot of personal information which seems absurd. Why do you need my information for me to learn how awful of a president he is. He is possibly the most sexist, racist, terrible human beings to walk the earth. This man, if you can even call him that, does not deserve to be in office and has to go. America is not great, and he is only making it worse. Terrible app for a terrible president. James Buchanan, you are finally being replaced for the worst president in history.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I got this app since my mother was so supportive of our “dear” president but as soon as I opened it my tablet was just completely shut down by all of the bugs and viruses in it. (You’d think America’s PRESENT should be able to at least give you an app that actually WORKS but I guess that just shows how “great” of a president he actually is.) Unfortunately, soon Trump started becoming homophobic so I just gave up on him. Let’s face it; America stopped being great as soon as he became president.
attributes.title: Do NOT download

attributes.review: when I opened the app I saw trump everywhere, it was like opening up a circus tent and seeing a bunch of clowns. on top of that, it was very laggy (just like his ability to take care of this country). I tried to cheat and skip past the phone number part, just like how trump cheated on all of his wives, and skipped through all of his marriages. Overall, save some space on your phone,( just like how we will be saving space for joe Biden in the white house in the fall) and dont download this app😊
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTANG

attributes.review: The second I open the app it took 30 minutes to load and it wouldn’t even let me sign in this thing makes Trump look smart very smart and won’t let me delete it for some reason I am now stuck with this app on my phone I have been forced to hide it in like the back of my folders I hate this and I hate Trump and please don’t band TickTock even though we  RSVPed and didn’t show doesn’t mean that we deserve this
attributes.title: This app is terrible it’s so buggy and slow

attributes.review:
guess WHAT.
i downloaded the app. then, i opened it. it showed a orange man with a tiny pp named cheeto. “cheeto 2020!!!!” i was so confused  ✨🧚🏻‍♀️💅🏻 i quickly signed in and saw people panicking... ALL OF THEM WERE THE AMAZING SUPPORTERS! then, it showed a robot behind them. there were the supporters in each hand. I DIDNT WANT TO BE KILLED! i then heard screaming. i went outside to see my mom BEING HELD BY THE ROBOT!!!! i RAN inside to my cheeto truck again 🥳💅🏻✨💗 i then saw ALL OF MY CHEETOS FLOAT!!!!! i ran inside my house again, and close the app.
long story short: IF YOU INSTALL IT, YOU WILL DIE 😱😱🤬🤬
attributes.title: I ALMOST DIED 😱😱🤬🤬

attributes.review: First of all mr. orange 🍊 you said u would open everything up! And don’t care who catch the coronavirus!😡 Like you don’t know what your even doing as president 🤬! Like u tried to start a war and put us in danger!🤬 You are disrespecting the #BLM!🤬🙏🏽 I wish I could give this app a 0.!😡 WE WILL NOT BE QUITE WE WILL STAND UP FOR OUR SELFS! Like ur taking down tiktok for what? So ur son can’t get on it? Like look how ur treating us were gonna be bored just because of ur orange self.🤬🍊 AND ALL TRUMP SUPPORTERS YALL BLIND LOoK HOW HE TREATING US!
attributes.title: Please forgive me lord what I’m about to say to this orange 🍊 🙏🏽

attributes.review: I downloaded this because I absolutely love trump. He’s my little orange smol bean. But as soon as I downloaded and put my number it, it texted me my exact address and said “we are coming for you”. I immediately deleted it and got really freaked out. I assume it has to do with the fact I am a woman. Maybe suspected trafficking having to do with Jeffery Epstein? I don’t know but this just supports the rumors I didn’t think were true about Trump being involved. Maybe I was wrong😖.
attributes.title: This App Tracked Me
